channel.title: Need help with some donate items!
channel.description: On my server items that just can be worn by donaters and I dont know how I can fix so all player can use it, some help?

item.title: Need help with some donate items!
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

[quote=“blitz ags, post:2, topic:346519”]Open client.java and search for the message it say and delete the code.

Code should look something like this,

if(wearID == 8776 && (donator != 1)) { sM("You Need To Be A Donator To Wear This Item."); return false; }[/quote]

Your not very specific with were it should be. do you just open client.java and then paste it or what?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with some donate items!

item.title: Need help with some donate items!
item.dc:creator: @kokosal kokosal
item.description:
@kokosal wrote:

When I search afther wear, donate and all the others it just comes can find …
But when I buy it from donate items seller dude on my server or make it it still says “You need to be a donator to wear this item” and Ive tried to make me to Mod, admin, owner it only works as a donator

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with some donate items!

item.title: Need help with some donate items!
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

In client.java find whatever it says when you try to wear the item and delete it… Ex. If it says “You need to be a donator to wear this item” Then open client.java and ctrl+f and type that in and it should find it.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with some donate items!

item.title: Need help with some donate items!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

search for the ItemID that you want to wear in client.java and you should see something beside like this:

donator

delete that entire code (which starts from if and ends with a }) and compile, restarts, you can wear it!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with some donate items!
